title: Watch the 2-minute address Jerome Powell gave after the Fed received grand jury subpoenas
full_text:
Watch the 2-minute address Jerome Powell gave after the Fed received grand jury subpoenas. In a rare video message, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell called the subpoenas an "unprecedented action.". Fed chief Jerome Powell.Li Yuanqing/Xinhua via Getty Images
  • Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell announced grand jury subpoenas from the Department of Justice.
  • Powell linked the subpo… [+2472 chars]
